touristy.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a place that is touristy is full of tourists and the things that attract tourists – used to show disapproval
touristy.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Benidorm is too touristy for me.
touristy.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a touristy activity is typical of the things that tourists do – used to show disapproval
touristy.translation[0].definitions[1].e: We did all the usual touristy things.
